Our Portfolio.

Our clients trust us to help them grow their businesses.

Oatlands College

Oatlands College is a well-known, long-established secondary school based in South Dublin. A key challenge for this customer was the lose of access to the domain and the hosting account which we were able to solve.

Technical Overview

This project is another secondary school that needed work to make the site fully accessible on mobile devices. Part of the project was also upgrading the PHP version of the server and proving advice on SSL certificates and automated database and file backups.

Technologies used
  • Wordpress
  • Customs HTML and SCSS
  • Social Media Integrations
View live project

Coláiste Cois Life

Coláiste Cois Life is an all Irish second level school based in Lucan, Co. Dublin. A key element of this project was integrating the site with a pre-existing school app that allows the app and the Wordpress site to sync news items, galleries and notifications.

Technical Overview

This site had already been setup on Wordpress but needed redesign and responisve optimisation. We worked with the school to tease out the priorties of the main user groups and put the resources at their fingertips.

Technologies used
  • Wordpress
  • Custom HTML/SCSS
  • Automatic School Custom App Integration
  • Automatic Social Media Feeds
View live project

Mach-Safe

Mach-Safe provides safety and machine certification. This project was a full branding exercise where we defined designed the logo for the business first, defining typography and colours, then built the custom webiste to match.

Technical Overview

Responisve design and a mobile-first appraoch was key to this project as the client understood that most of his customers would visit their site from mobile devices while on site. We needed to visually communicate the services provided while providing the core information needed by the visitors.

Technologies used
  • HTML
  • SCSS
  • JavaScript
  • AOS Library
  • Google Analytics Integrations
View live project

Building Tendering Service Ltd.

BTSL are one of New Zealand's largest construction tendering sites providing a digital platform for contracters.

Technical Overview

Bootstrap/SCSS and Javascript used to create user interfaces for features like document uploads/management and project searches. The UIs made use of modals and expandable elements for optimal organisation.

Technologies used
  • HTML
  • SCSS
  • JavaScript
  • Bootstrap
View live project

Gladwin Borthers Restaurants

The Gladwin Brother own and operate many UK-based resturants.

Technical Overview

This site uses WEPB image formats to reduce load time and OWL carosels for responsive galleries. The structure is HTML5, Bootstrap/Custom CSS and jaavscript behaviours for desktop and mobile.

Technologies used
  • HTML/SCSS
  • OWL JS
  • JavaScript
  • Bootstrap
View live project

Flex Power Solutions

This Irish company are on a mission to make a cleaner, energy-efficient future for Ireland. Flex Power Solutions needed a website design to communicate the benefits of diverting excess renewable energy into high-efficiency heat and steam generation.

Technical Overview

Our role was website design and front-end web development. We used bootstrap for a responsive layout because we wanted to get the foundations laid fast. We added custom javascript for the navbar and header on scroll. We also implemented the AOS library to add more style and animation to the site. We worked with a back end developer who specialises in Laravel, we wrote temporary routes before he structured the project to allow the client to update the content on pages through a basic CMS

Technologies used
  • HTML
  • SCSS
  • JavaScript
View live project

Hello Altra

Altra needed a website with a fast load speed to inform their clients of a new web app they developed for the nursing home sector.

Technical Overview

Our role was to convert the Adobe XD website design files and convert them into a semantic front-end build using Bootstrap with Google Analytics and Calendy integration.

Technologies used
  • HTML
  • SCSS
  • JavaScript
  • Bootstrap
Hello Altra Website

Bromptom Wine

A UK-based winery selling products and services including training.

Technical Overview

Our role was to use Bootstrap to write the front end of the website with integrated store and also the backend of the admin pages to allow the owner to add new products and events.

Technologies used
  • HTML
  • SCSS
  • JavaScript
  • Bootstrap
View Live project

Gradient

The National College of Art and Design uses an alpha grade system for their assessments. This easy-to-use tool allows staff to save time by calculating the overall average grade for up to four assessment criteria.

Technical Overview

Gradient is a simple javascript calculator. It began as a spreadsheet to make assessments quicker and more accurate. That was later developed into its first form of Gradey+. Gradient was devloped from that when the layout was redesigned to be mobile-friendly.

Technologies used
  • HTML
  • SCSS
  • JavaScript
